headline: Wolfspeed, Inc. (WOLF) Appoints Bret Zahn as Vice President and General Manager
summary: With a share price under $3 and strong hedge fund interest, Wolfspeed, Inc. (NYSE:WOLF) secures a spot on our list of the 10 Best AI Stocks to Buy Under $3. On August 5, 2025, Wolfspeed, Inc. (NYSE:WOLF) appointed Bret Zahn as Vice President and General Manager of its Automotive business, strengthening its commitment to the […]
